name: Game Gen - Lunar Lander
description:
Controls:

Left/Right Arrows or A and D - Rotate Left and Right

Up Arrow or W - Accelerate

Another entry based on a classic game, Lunar Lander is a game where you take control of a space shuttle touching down onto various targets, where each target gives a certain score based on the number provided below them.
The harder the target, the higher the score it gives.

The game resets when you run out of fuel, and the goal is to get the highest score you can before it does.
